response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to maximize your return on investment while aligning with your business goals. We're confident it will provide substantial value to your company. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
